meanings.definition: A synthetic chemical element with the symbol Cn and atomic number 112.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study copernicium to learn more about its properties.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes copernicium as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When the copernicium particles danced, they created a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe where copernicium atoms collided in endless exploration.
meanings.sent5: The laboratory glowed with the mysterious allure of copernicium.
